TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseCompareValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator
Public MustInherit Class BaseCompareValidator Inherits BaseValidator

summary.span: 作为执行类型化比较的验证控件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls that perform typed comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由比较值（如和控件）的验证控件继承， 以提供基本的通用功能。The class is inherited by validation controls that compare values, such as the and controls, to provide basic common functionality. 使用 属性指定在比较之前值要转换成的数据类型。Use the property to specify the data type that the values are converted to before being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果要验证的输入控件的值无法转换为指定的数据类型，则验证将失败。If the value of the input control being validated cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails. 验证控件的属性设置为 `false` 。The property of the validation control is set to `false`. 类还包含多个静态属性和方法，它们在执行比较验证时非常有用。The class also contains several static properties and methods that are useful when performing comparison validations. 您可以使用方法确定是否可将字符串转换为特定数据类型 。You can determine whether a string can be converted to a specific data type by using the method. 可以用两位数的年份表示的最大年份包含在 属性中。The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year is contained in the property. 方法允许将两位数的年份转换为四位数的年份。The method allows you to convert a two-digit year to a four-digit year. > [!NOTE] > 使用从控件内的控件派生的验证程序控件时 ，请确保验证程序控件及其关联的控件位于同一面板中。When you use validator controls that derive from the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关将 控件用于部分页面更新的详细信息，请参阅 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). 有关验证控件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类是抽象类，因此不能 直接创建对象。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 此构造函数通常由派生类的构造函数调用，用于初始化类中定义的属性 。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

summary.span: 将需要为控件呈现的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 对象。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于呈现控件的 HTML 标记中控件的特性。The method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control. 此方法通常由派生类中的控件开发人员重写，以将适当的特性和样式插入 控件的输出流中。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control.

para.span: 重写 方法时，请确保调用基类中的相应方法。

span.span: When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class.

para.span: 否则，将不会呈现基类中包含的属性。

span.span: Otherwise, the attributes contained in the base class will not be rendered.

span.span: if the specified data string can be converted to the specified data type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可确定指定的字符串是否可以转换为指定的数据类型。Use the method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type. 此方法通常用于在执行依赖于该数据类型的操作之前，测试是否可以将该字符串转换为兼容的数据类型。This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type. 此版本的方法使用当前区域性使用的格式来测试值。This version of the method tests the value using the format used by the current culture. 若要使用非特定区域性格式测试值，请使用 此方法的重载版本。To test the value using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来比较两个整数值，并确定是否可以转换第二个整数。The following example demonstrates using the method to compare two integer values and determine whether the second integer can be converted. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert/CS/basecomparevalidatorcanconvertcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert/VB/basecomparevalidatorcanconvertvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the specified data string can be converted to the specified data type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可确定指定的字符串是否可以转换为指定的数据类型。Use the method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type. 此方法通常用于在执行依赖于该数据类型的操作之前，测试是否可以将该字符串转换为兼容的数据类型。This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type. 若要指示应使用非特定区域性格式测试值，请传入 `true` `cultureInvariant` 参数; 否则，将使用当前区域性使用的格式来测试值。To indicate that values should be tested using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are tested using the format used by the current culture. 使用当前区域性使用的格式测试值时，请考虑使用 此方法的重载版本。When testing a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

span.span: if the parameter relates to the parameter in the manner specified by the parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于测试参数的值是否与参数所 `leftText` `rightText` 指定的方法中的值相关 `op` 。The method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter. `type`参数指定要比较的值的数据类型。The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 `op` 参数设置为 `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck` ，则此方法只测试 `leftText` 参数指定的数据类型的参数值 `type` 。If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter. `rightText`忽略参数。The `rightText` parameter is ignored. 此版本的方法使用当前区域性使用的格式比较这些值。This version of the method compares the values using the format used by the current culture. 若要使用非特定区域性格式比较值，请使用 此方法的重载版本。To compare the values using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于测试参数的值是否与参数所 `leftText` `rightText` 指定的方法中的值相关 `op` 。The method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter. `type`参数指定要比较的值的数据类型。The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 `op` 参数设置为 `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck` ，则此方法只测试 `leftText` 参数指定的数据类型的参数值 `type` 。If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter. `rightText`忽略参数。The `rightText` parameter is ignored. 若要指示应使用非特定区域性格式对值进行比较，请传入 `true` `cultureInvariantLeftText` 和 `cultureInvariantRightText` 参数; 否则，将使用当前区域性使用的格式来比较值。To indicate that values should be compared using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariantLeftText` and `cultureInvariantRightText` parameters; otherwise, the values are compared using the format used by the current culture. 使用当前区域性使用的格式比较值时，请考虑使用 此方法的重载版本。When comparing values using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

returns.span: 如果转换成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the conversion is successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将文本转换为指定数据类型的对象。The method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type. 尽管方法返回 `true` 或 `false` 以指示转换是否成功，但转换后的值存储在 `value` `out` 参数中。Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value` `out` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果转换不成功，则将 `value` 参数设置为 `null` 。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`. 此版本的方法使用当前区域性使用的格式来转换值。This version of the method converts values using the format used by the current culture. 若要使用非特定区域性格式转换值，请使用 此方法的重载版本。To convert values using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将文本转换为指定数据类型的对象。The method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type. 尽管方法返回 `true` 或 `false` 以指示转换是否成功，但转换后的值存储在 `value` `out` 参数中。Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value` `out` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果转换不成功，则将 `value` 参数设置为 `null` 。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`. 若要指示应使用非特定区域性格式转换值，请为参数传入 `true` `cultureInvariant` ; 否则，将使用当前区域性使用的格式转换值。To indicate that values should be converted using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are converted using the format used by the current culture. 使用当前区域性使用的格式转换值时，请考虑使用 此方法的重载版本。When converting a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在比较之前将值转换为非特定区域性格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether values are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared.

value.span: 若要在比较之前将值转换为非特定区域性格式，则为; 否则为。否则为 。

span.span: to convert values to a culture-neutral format before they are compared; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为，则在 `true` 进行比较之前，不是强类型的控件的属性将转换为非特定区域性格式。When the property is set to `true`, properties of the control that are not strongly typed are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则会将值转换为当前区域性的格式。When this property is set to `false`, values are converted to the format of the current culture. 属性不影响网页上的控件用户输入的值。The property does not affect values that are entered by users of the control on a Web page. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or by style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取可以用两位数的年份表示的最大年份。

span.span: Gets the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数的年份表示的最大年份。

span.span: The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以确定在100年范围内可由两位数年份表示的最大年份。Use the property to determine the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range. 例如，如果此属性包含值 `2029` ，则可以使用两位数年份表示年份1930到2029。For example, if this property contains the value `2029`, you can represent the years 1930 to 2029 using a two-digit year. 两位数的年份30解释为1930，而29解释为2029。The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029. 不能直接更改此属性的值;不过，您可以通过设置属性来更改可以用两位数年份表示的最大年份 。You cannot change the value of this property directly; however, you can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the property.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool DetermineRenderUplevel ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool DetermineRenderUplevel() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function DetermineRenderUplevel () As Boolean
protected: override bool DetermineRenderUplevel();
override this.DetermineRenderUplevel : unit -> bool

summary.span: 确定是否可以为更新的（“上级”）浏览器呈现验证控件。

span.span: Determines whether the validation control can be rendered for a newer ("uplevel") browser.

returns.span: 如果可以为“上级”浏览器呈现验证控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the validation control can be rendered for an "uplevel" browser; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器函数，主要由 属性用来确定客户端的浏览器是否支持 "上级" 呈现 (在较新的浏览器) 上呈现。The method is a helper function used primarily by the property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering (rendering on a newer browser). `false` 如果当前区域性使用非公历日历，则类会重写此方法以返回。The class overrides this method to return `false` if the current culture uses a non-Gregorian calendar. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 重写 方法时，请确保调用基类中的相应方法。

span.span: When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class.

para.span: 否则，将绕过基类中定义的条件。

span.span: Otherwise, conditions defined in the base class will be bypassed.

Protected Shared Function GetDateElementOrder () As String
protected: static System::String ^ GetDateElementOrder();

summary.span: 确定当前区域性日期值中年、月和日的顺序。

span.span: Determines the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.

returns.span: 一个字符串，表示当前区域性日期值中年、月和日的显示顺序。

span.span: A string that represents the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日期值的月、日和年可以按不同的顺序出现，具体取决于当前区域性设置。The month, day, and year of a date value can appear in different orders depending on the current culture settings. 方法用于确定这些值的显示顺序。The method is used to determine the order in which these values appear. 下表显示了此方法返回的不同值。The following table shows the different values returned by this method. |日期元素顺序Date element order|返回值Return value| |------------------------|------------------| |Day、Month、YearDay, Month, Year|dmy"dmy"| |月、日、年Month, Day, Year|mdy"mdy"| |年、月、日Year, Month, Day|ymd"ymd"|

MemberSignature.Value: protected static int GetFullYear (int shortYear);
.method familystatic hidebysig int32 GetFullYear(int32 shortYear) cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetFullYear (shortYear As Integer) As Integer
protected: static int GetFullYear(int shortYear);
static member GetFullYear : int -> int

span.span: A two-digit year.

summary.span: 生成指定的两位数的年份的四位数年份表示形式。

span.span: Generates the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.

returns.span: 指定的两位数的年份的四位数年份表示形式。

span.span: The four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法生成指定的两位数年份的四位数年份表示形式。Use the method to generate the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year. 四位数年份表示形式取决于属性的值，该 属性包含在100年范围内可由两位数年份表示的最大年份。The four-digit year representation depends on the value of the property, which contains the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range. 例如，如果 属性包含值 `2029` ，则该 方法返回介于1930和2029之间的年份。For example, if the property contains the value `2029`, the method returns a year between 1930 and 2029. 两位数的年份30解释为1930，而29解释为2029。The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029. 您可以通过设置属性来更改可以用两位数年份表示的最大年份 。You can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 由于此方法是 `static` ，因此你可以在不创建类的实例的情况下使用它，方法是将方法名称和类名（例如）限定为 `BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear` 。Because this method is `static`, you can use it without creating an instance of the class by qualifying the method name along with the class name--for example, `BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear`.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType Type { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType Type
Public Property Type As ValidationDataType
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType Type { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType value); };
member this.Type : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在比较之前将所比较的值转换到的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type that the values being compared are converted to before the comparison is made.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定用于比较的数据类型。Use the property to specify the data type used for comparison. 各种比较验证控件以不同的方式使用属性。The property is used differently by the various comparison validation controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果将 属性设置为 ，并且当前日历类型为非公历，则验证程序将仅执行服务器端验证。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本仅支持公历日历。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 例如，在控件中 ，要进行比较的所有值 (输入控件的上限、下限和值) 在执行任何比较之前都转换为指定的数据类型。For example, in the control, all values being compared (the upper bound, lower bound, and value of the input control) are converted to the specified data type before any comparison is performed. 但是，如果使用 控件并将其属性设置 为 `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck` ，则仅输入控件的值将转换为指定的数据类型。However, if you use a control and set its property to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, only the value of the input control is converted to the specified data type. > [!NOTE] > 如果与验证控件关联的输入控件的值无法转换为指定的数据类型，则验证将失败。If the value of the input control associated with the validation control cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails. 验证控件的属性设置为 `false` 。The property of the validation control is set to `false`. 下表列出了可用于属性的值 。The following table lists the values that you can use for the property. |数据类型Data type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|指定 string 数据类型。Specifies a string data type.| |`Integer`|指定32位有符号整数数据类型。Specifies a 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|指定双精度浮点数字数据类型。Specifies a double-precision floating-point number data type.| |`Date`|指定日期数据类型。Specifies a date data type.| |`Currency`|指定货币数据类型。Specifies a monetary data type.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定在进行比较之前将所比较的值转换为的数据类型。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data type that the values being compared are converted to before the comparison is made. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的数据类型不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified data type is not one of the values.
